# nbdev_cards

<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

## Install

Install using:

``` sh
pip install nbdev_cards
```

## How to use

The lib provides a
[`Card`](https://joLahann.github.io/nbdev_cards/cards.html#card) class

``` python
Card(1,1)
```

    A♦️

``` python
suits
```

    ['♣️', '♦️', '❤️', '♠️']
